snippet: Argentina coach Alejandro Sabella says Enzo Perez is likely to replace injured winger Angel di Maria in the World Cup semifinal against the Netherlands....

headline.print_headline: Perez Likely to Replace Di Maria for Argentina
headline.main: Perez Likely to Replace Di Maria for Argentina

lead_paragraph: Argentina coach Alejandro Sabella says Enzo Perez is likely to replace injured winger Angel di Maria in the World Cup semifinal against the Netherlands.
